description:
Sakamoto continues to strike out the batters and consecutively strikes out the 20th batter. The rain is getting heavier, but the two coaches are still fiercely determined.
Keiyo`s Hosogoe doesn`t show the slightest fear when facing Sakamoto and still shows excellent control of the ball.
Due to the rain,  the umpire calls the end of the match.  The pitchers of both teams have struck out 21 batters and it`s a tie.
Ever since their first game with Keiyo, the school has received a lot of supports from all areas.
A new year is coming, Kurokan gets really drunk in the party at his place and talk about his goal: to play at Koshien Stadium.
Source: crunchyroll
